skills.name: honcho-clawd-handoff
skills.description: Generate a research handoff summary of the current debugging session. Use when stuck in trial-and-error to hand off context to a deep research agent.

skills.name: honcho-clawd-list
skills.description: List all Honcho sessions for persistent memory

skills.name: honcho-clawd-status
skills.description: Show current Honcho session and memory status

skills.name: honcho-clawd-new
skills.description: Create or connect to a Honcho session for persistent memory

skills.name: honcho-clawd-clear
skills.description: Clear custom Honcho session for current directory (revert to default)

skills.name: honcho-clawd-switch
skills.description: Switch to a different Honcho session
